Title: TheOliver.DigitalSignage
Description: A digital signage solution in Silverlight.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A digital signage solution in Silverlight.

TheOliver.DigitalSignage is a solution for events, to present the agenda of different rooms/slots.
It's build on Visual Studio 2010, Silverligh 4 and the WCF RIA Services.
